items.content_html: Envelop is a lightweight library allowing developers to easily develop, share, collaborate and extend their GraphQL execution layer. Envelop is the missing GraphQL plugin system.

items.content_html: Listifly is a lightweight and user-friendly task management application designed to help individuals and teams organize their tasks, create to-do lists, and boost productivity.
items.title: AnnaKondrDeveloper/Listifly: Listifly is a lightweight and user-friendly task management application designed to help individuals and teams organize their tasks, create to-do lists, and boost productivity.

items.content_html: This is a simple and lightweight web-based video calling application built using modern web technologies. It allows users to initiate real-time video calls directly from their web browsers, enabling seamless communication and collaboration between individuals or groups.
items.title: devesh-y/Video-Calling-Application: This is a simple and lightweight web-based video calling application built using modern web technologies. It allows users to initiate real-time video calls directly from their web browsers, enabling seamless communication and collaboration between individuals or groups.

items.content_html: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.
items.title: orchidjs/tom-select: Tom Select is a lightweight (~16kb gzipped) hybrid of a textbox and select box. Forked from selectize.js to provide a framework agnostic autocomplete widget with native-feeling keyboard navigation. Useful for tagging, contact lists, etc.

items.content_html: Mobile-friendly web-app for remote workers. Orgs/ projects can post jobs/gigs & hire applicants by paying few Sats. Applicants apply to most jobs/ gigs for free (unless required by orgs/ projects to fight application spam). Our platform distinguishes itself through Nostr and LN for payments & reputation management. Lightweight matchmaking service.
items.title: Bitshala-Incubator/upsats: Mobile-friendly web-app for remote workers. Orgs/ projects can post jobs/gigs & hire applicants by paying few Sats. Applicants apply to most jobs/ gigs for free (unless required by orgs/ projects to fight application spam). Our platform distinguishes itself through Nostr and LN for payments & reputation management. Lightweight matchmaking service.
